Class InteractableObjectsView

java.lang.Object
view.interactableObjectsViews.InteractableObjectsView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class InteractableObjectsView extends Object implements Observer
view , every single interactable object views is collected in here. it is created once in GameView, and changes the room via the observer pattern. it is the observer of LevelManager, so when it gets notified of the room change, it will reload the interactable object views via refreshViews()

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractableObjectsView

      public InteractableObjectsView(LevelManager levelManager)
      created once in the GameView. it is a collection of each InteractableObject in the currentRoom.
      Parameters:
      levelManager - LevelManager model

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      updates the currentRoom via the observer pattern, whenever the player enters a new room and changes LevelManager.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - the observable object.
      arg - an argument passed to the notifyObservers method.

    • initializeViews

      private void initializeViews()
      scans the currentRoom's interactive objects, and creates each view.

    • refreshViews

      private void refreshViews()
      refreshes the interactable object views. clears the object view lists ex.paperBoxViews and re-initializes them via initializeViews()

    • drawInteractableObjects

      public void drawInteractableObjects(Graphics2D g2d)
      draws every single interactable object view
      Parameters:
      g2d - swing's graphics 2d instance that allows rendering
